text: The Olympian Way was a BBC comedy drama series set in a health club that was written by Tara Prem.https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0081910/https://seriesepisode.com/the- olympian-way_28308 The plot centres around the successful and ambitious millionaire Stan Wilson has invested heavily in a health club and his son Terry (played by Hugh Fraser (actor)http://www.theartistspartnership.co.uk/Client/ClientProfile/134/hugh- fraser) and wife Stella (played by Lois Daine)https://www.videodetective.com/show/the-olympian-way-10049/season/1, who run the health club and try not to let Stan downThe Guardian, 27 June 1981. The series also starred among others Alan Lake, Christopher Ryan, Paul Brooke and Adrienne Posta and the theme tune was composed by Lynsey De Paul.https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0081910/ Each episode was 45 minutes long.Radio Times, issue 3007, 25 June 1981 It was shown on BBC 1 in 1981, with episode 1 airing on the first of July that year.https://genome.ch.bbc.co.uk/678713bfb6b54a8ba4b46f7a593ba9b5 ==References== Category:BBC television dramas Category:BBC comedy-drama television shows
